text: Are you storing a struct, an enum, or a class?

options.text: I want to store a struct or an enum.
I want to store a class.

text: Will the value change over time?

options.text: Yes, it will change as my app runs.

text: Are you creating the value in your view, or will it be passed in from somewhere else?

options.text: I'll be creating the value locally in my view.
I'll be passing in the value from somewhere else.

text: Is the property being used to track an active user gesture?

options.text: Yes, this is for a gesture.
No, this is just a regular value.

text: Is it an object you're creating locally in your view, or will it be created somewhere else and passed in to your view?

options.text: I'm creating the object locally in my view.
The object will be passed in from somewhere else.

text: Will the object be in the SwiftUI environment, or do you want to pass it in manually?

options.text: The object will be in the SwiftUI environment.
I want to pass it in manually as a parameter.
